title: Jocelyn Cockburn: Lawyer plans legal challenge against Government over failure to tackle air pollution
text: A leading human rights lawyer is preparing a landmark legal challenge against the Government over its failure to tackle the lethal effects of air pollution, The Independent on Sunday can reveal. Jocelyn Cockburn, who successfully fought to
